about_the_game:
Hello, Cadet!

Welcome to Cosmic Pew Pew, an intergalactic shipping company. Are you ready to begin your training for piloting the clumsiest spaceship in the galaxy?

The following is a demo for the full game "Clumsy Rocketship"
detailed_description:
Hello, Cadet!

Welcome to Cosmic Pew Pew, an intergalactic shipping company. Are you ready to begin your training for piloting the clumsiest spaceship in the galaxy?

The following is a demo for the full game "Clumsy Rocketship"
name: Clumsy Rocketship Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 / AMD FX-6300
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These specifications are subject to change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 / AMD FX-8320
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 / AMD Radeon HD 7970 / R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These specifications are subject to change.

short_description: Demo for Physics Based Arcade Game where you control a "Clumsy Rocketship". Navigate through Challenging Levels to find out if you are fit for taking up the challenge of beating the game !
